Dialogue: It'll work.

Dialogue: Very good. Please aim for the tires.

Dialogue: Just don't stop.

Dialogue: Too many of them.

Dialogue: Just keep driving.

Dialogue: I'm...I'm sorry I got you into--

Speaker: piper
Dialogue: You know what happens to her if they stop us.

Dialogue: No. You don't just drive. Drive angry! Drive with the motherfuckin' rage that'll take us through that motherfuckin' roadblock!

Dialogue: No Goddamn way. No ever-loving way in God's good heaven are you a... The Accountant steps down, thrusting his badge' into Cap's face stopping him cold.

Dialogue: Federal Bureau of get the fuck outta my way. You boys have blundered into an on-going Federal case. Now, lower your... He stops, turns...sniffs the air. His focus settles on a YOUNG FACED TROOPER.

Speaker: milton

Dialogue: I think not.

Dialogue: Don't hurt her. Th-Thank you.

Dialogue: You did not.

Dialogue: That's cute. You haven't told her?

Speaker: milton
Dialogue: She don't listen.

Dialogue: Then why? Why help me?

Dialogue: Simple. Like the warden, we all have jobs to do. Getting you here makes my job easier. You get what you want, I get what I want.

Dialogue: --No.

Dialogue: Hold on tight. It has quite a kick.

Dialogue: You lose.
